==Russian==

===Etymology===
{{PIE root|ru|ǵneh₃}}
From {{inh|ru|orv|знати}}, from {{inh|ru|sla-pro|*znati}}, from {{der|ru|ine-pro|*ǵneh₃-}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{ru-IPA}}
* {{audio|Ru-знать.ogg|Audio|lang=ru}}

===Verb===
{{ru-verb|знать|impf|pf=узна́ть}}

# to [[know]]: to be familiar with or accustomed to a person, place, or thing
#: {{uxi|ru|[[я|Я]] [[её]] [[хорошо́]] '''зна́ю'''.|I '''know''' her well.}}
#: {{uxi|ru|[[я|Я]] [[хорошо́]] '''зна́ю''' [[математика|матема́тику]].|I '''know''' math well.}}
# to [[know]]: to be in possession of a specific fact or datum
#: {{uxi|ru|[[я|Я]] '''зна́ю''', [[где]] [[он]] [[жить|живёт]].|I '''know''' where he lives.}}
#: {{uxi|ru|[[я|Я]] '''зна́ю''', [[ско́лько]] [[два]] [[плюс]] [[два]].|I '''know''' how much two plus two is.}}
#: {{uxi|ru|[[я|Я]] [[не]] '''зна́ю''', [[когда́]] [[э́то]] [[быть|бы́ло]].|I don’t '''know''' when it was.}}
